articles.title: Video: Brittney Griner's Russian counsel speaks to CNN - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Fred Pleitgen speaks with Brittney Griner's Russian counsel Maria Blagovolina about Griner's well-being and their trial strategy.

articles.author: Wayne Sterling, CNN
articles.title: NBA legend Bill Russell dies at 88
articles.description: Eleven-time NBA champion and Boston Celtics legend Bill Russell has died at age 88.

articles.author: Tami Luhby and Daniella Diaz, CNN
articles.title: Republicans argue Manchin and Schumer's energy, health care deal will raise taxes, citing nonpartisan data

articles.author: Tina Burnside and Holly Yan, CNN
articles.title: A mass shooting in downtown Orlando leaves 7 people hospitalized. The assailant is still at large
articles.description: At least seven shooting victims were hospitalized Sunday after a melee in downtown Orlando, Florida.

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová, Olga Voitovych, Darya Tarasova, Manveena Suri, Kareem Khadder, Josh Pennington, Nic Robertson
articles.title: Mykolaiv in Ukraine hit with heavy shelling as Putin threatens 'lightning speed' response to interference
articles.description: The southern Ukrainian city of Mykolaiv came under intense shelling in the early morning hours on Sunday, according to officials there, as Russian President Vladimir Putin used his nation's Navy Day to issue more militaristic threats.

articles.author: Artemis Moshtaghian and Justin Gamble, CNN
articles.title: Georgia authorities release body camera footage after woman dies following fall from patrol car
articles.description: Georgia authorities released body camera footage Friday of an incident from earlier this month where a mother experiencing what her family called a mental health crisis died due to a fatal injury while in police custody.

articles.author: Ivan Watson, CNN
articles.title: Ballet, busking, bathing: How Ukrainians are defying Russia by embracing 'normal life'
articles.description: Life in this country at war can appear deceptively peaceful. People still go to work, walk their dogs and play with their children in the park.
articles.content:
Odesa, Ukraine (CNN)On the banks of the Dnieper River, parents sunbathe on the beach as their children splash in the cool, refreshing water.

articles.author: Tim Lister, Gul Tuysuz and Kostan Nechyporenko, CNN
articles.title: 'Appalling' videos alleged to show Russian soldiers castrating a Ukrainian soldier
articles.description: Videos alleged to show Russian soldiers castrating and killing a bound and gagged Ukrainian soldier are circulating on social media, drawing an accusation of potential war crimes from the United Nations and prompting a Ukrainian investigation into possible to…

articles.author: Tim Lister and Josh Pennington, CNN
articles.title: Russia is recruiting thousands of volunteers to replenish its ranks in Ukraine. Prior experience isn't always required
articles.description: Across Russia, volunteer battalions are being formed to deploy to the war in Ukraine, joining the so-called "special military operation" declared by President Vladimir Putin in February.
